data.name: CODE7
data.description:
CODE7 is a multiplayer battle shooting game that supports 8-player online intense and exciting battles, as well as classic competition modes and rich weapon configurations. Players will gain experience in the game, upgrade their level, unlock and upgrade weapons and accessories, and obtain hero avatar characters. In later updates, PVE story mode will be added, simulating the real rapid-fire game mode, and a customized avatar system.

Special feature
Battlefield Weapons: Special battlefield weapons such as drones and mechanical dogs can be activated in battle.
Gunsmith system: You can upgrade and unlock the accessories of various parts of the gun, and you can customize the gun body painting and pendant.
Character skills: Skills can be equipped to enhance character abilities and gain an advantage in battle.
Hero Avatars: Hero avatars of different genders and backgrounds are available.
Growth level: You can continuously upgrade the level and title to level 100, and get special rewards.
Competition Mode: Contains 5 classic modes and multiple maps such as Team Deathmatch, Demolition, and Occupation.
Private game: You can create a private room with your friends to join the game.

changelog.change_log: Added welcome page and quick start mode.
